subject: ANN: Be a Speaker at the Agile Development Practices 2008 Conference
msgSnippet: Agile Development Practices 2008 Conference November 10-13, 2008 * Orlando, Florida Shingle Creek Resort http://www.sqe.com/go?NG08ADP
messageBody:
Agile Development Practices 2008 Conference
November 10-13, 2008 * Orlando, Florida
Shingle Creek Resort
http://www.sqe.com/go?NG08ADP <http://www.sqe.com/go?NG08ADP>

We invite you to submit a presentation proposal for the Agile
Development Practices 2008 conference based on your experiences and
insight into software test and evaluation issues. Proposals are due by
Monday, May 12, 2008, and may cover any aspect of software testing,
analysis, and review including:

 Toward a More Agile Culture
 Five Practical Solutions to Agile Myths
 Decision Making in Agile Teams
 Artful Making for Agile Teams
 The First Thing to Build: Trust on Agile Teams
 Automating builds: Bringing Quality and Testing Forward
 Influence Strategies for Agile Developers
 Introduction to Agile for Traditional PMI Project Managers
 Introduction to User Stories
 Flow, Pull, Innovate: How Agile Teams Mature and Scale
 Executable Documentation
 Pragmatic Learning: Improve your Learning Skills
 Maintaining Sustainable Agility
 Empirical Studies of Agile Practices
 Leading Successful Projects in Changing Environments
 Behavior Driven Database Design
 Using the Theory of Constraints to Coach Agile Teams
 Making People and Processes Congruent
 Agile Development and Its Impact on Productivity
 Agile Software Testing Strategies
 API Design for Testability
 Climbing the Decision Tree: Reaching High Quality Team Decisions
 Organizational Patters: The Foundations of Agile
 Scrum: Roadmap for Implementation



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
